description: Thin and crispy and a bit like biscotti! Delicious with a cuppa and to share. Keeps in airtight box for 4 weeks.
name: Zesty Almond Bread Biscuits Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 orange, zested (i use a microplane, optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Measure out the ingredients and sift flour.
Beat egg whites with cream of tartar until light and frothy. Add in caster sugar to the egg white until glossy meringue and peaks don't droop
Preheat oven to 160 degrees with fan. Roast the blanched almonds for 5 minutes until lightly toasted.
Sift in the flour and add the zest. Fold the mixture with a spatula gently to mix everything.
Fold in the toasted almonds and pour into a loaf tin to bake for 25 minutes.

Let the loaf cool completely before slicing with a serrated bread knife into thin slices. Then place the slices flat onto baking trays and bake in the middle of the oven for 7 minutes. Flip the slices over and bake again for 7 minutes.
Let the biscuits cool down completely before you try them. Store them in an airtight container and share. For chocolate lovers, try drizzling or dipping one end into melted chocolate. mmmmm!
